Name: Villa's Blinds
About the game: Hello graduates! / You have a degree on computer engineering and you can’t find a job? Start now to develop a game in your rental garage . Advertise them and gather your own fan base. Earn your pocket money! Of course, you won’t live in this garbage dump till the end! Form your crew, split the expenses and move to places that’ll cover for your work! Get a bigger crew, be a corporate group! ↓ ↓ ↓ Details... ↓ ↓ ↓ There are lots of features that’ll enable you to make the game closest to the one in your dreams. ⚪ A graduate at the early 2000’s ⚪ Start with a decent game engine, and make a customized one later on. Add more features to your engine and make the games of high quality. ⚪ 18 different software tech and a few hardware tech (Motion Blur, Chromatic Aberration, Motion Capture and more..) ⚪ 32 different in-game theme with 3 different alternatives for each, 96 combination of themes. ⚪ Advertise your games in your way, select the amount of DVD to be burned before going for the digital market. Don’t forget your expenses! ⚪ Dozens of customizable interior design. Computer systems with different specs. ⚪ Feel like a boss when you are a corporate group, and manage your Corporation like a real game corp.
